references.paper_title: Is imitation learning the route to humanoid robots?
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of imitation learning, establishing the core concept and its potential application in robotics.

references.paper_title: An algorithmic perspective on imitation learning
references.reason: This survey provides a comprehensive overview of imitation learning algorithms and their theoretical underpinnings.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a powerful class of generative models that forms the basis of the diffusion policy used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduced score-based generative modeling, a related technique to DDPMs that also significantly impacted generative modeling.

references.paper_title: A lifelong learning approach to mobile robot navigation
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the application of lifelong learning in mobile robot navigation, a relevant application of imitation learning.
